webcopy.headline: Learn the Basics of XML
webcopy.description: Here are some articles that will further your XML knowledge.
webcopy.body:
Creating an XML-powered CMS

Are you tired of waiting around for your \"IT Guy\" or expensive designer to update your web site? Well, those days will be long forgotten if you buy our XML-powered CMS! With this revolutionary new tool, you can make quick and easy updates to your own web site! Forget all the hassles! It slices, it dices!
